[2]

[4]

Wiegele, A. (2007, September). Biq Mac Library: A collection of Max-Cut and quadratic 0–1 programming instances of medium size [Data set]. Alpen-Adria-Universität Klagenfurt. http://biqmac.uni-klu.ac.at/biqmaclib.html
